content.heading: Need help arranging a special event? Booking a table at an exclusive restaurant? Buying that special gift?
content.content: Our concierge service is there to help â€“ anytime. The 24/7 Black Concierge Service can help with all kinds of things including getting your hands on hard-to-get theatre tickets or booking a table at a top restaurant anywhere in the world. They'll recommend and secure a special gift for any occasion and even create that trip of a lifetime.

Call the 24/7 Black Concierge Service on

*[0345 266 8801](tel:03452668801)*

(Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*). Lines are open 24/7, 365 days a year. Calls will be recorded.

Please have your Black Account number to hand.

metaData.heading: Here's what other people are asking

content.heading: What can I order or request through the 24/7 Black Concierge Service?

content.content: It is possible to order or book air travel, car hire, chauffeur driven cars, flowers or gifts (including delivery), holidays, hotels, restaurants and event tickets, anywhere in the world. These can be organised 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

content.heading: How do I pay for items booked through the 24/7 Black Concierge Service?

content.content: Any goods, orders or services you book through the 24/7 Black Concierge Service may require payment in advance by a credit card or debit card. You may need to provide details of your debit or credit card in advance.

content.heading: Do I need to pay for the services or goods in full before my request can be fulfilled?

content.content: This will depend on the supplier that is providing the goods or service, and the nature of the request. Some items will need to be paid in full upfront, others will require a deposit.
